properties.name: app.jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key used for JWT token generation and validation.

properties.name: app.jwt.expiration
properties.description: Expiration time for JWT tokens in milliseconds.

properties.name: app.oss.bucket-name
properties.description: Name of the Aliyun OSS bucket for file storage.

properties.name: app.oss.region
properties.description: OSS bucket region identifier.

properties.name: app.oss.base-path
properties.description: Base directory path within the OSS bucket for storing files.

properties.name: app.sts.access-key-id
properties.description: Aliyun access key ID used for STS token generation.

properties.name: app.sts.access-key-secret
properties.description: Aliyun access key secret used for STS token generation.

properties.name: app.sts.endpoint
properties.description: Endpoint URL for the Aliyun STS service.

properties.name: app.sts.region-id
properties.description: Aliyun region ID where resources are located.

properties.name: app.sts.role-arn
properties.description: ARN of the RAM role to assume for temporary credentials.

properties.name: app.sts.token-expire-time
properties.description: Expiration time for STS tokens in seconds.

properties.name: app.alipay.app-id
properties.description: Alipay application ID assigned by Alipay Developer Platform.

properties.name: app.alipay.merchant-private-key
properties.description: RSA private key for the merchant application to sign requests.

properties.name: app.alipay.alipay-public-key
properties.description: Alipay's public key used to verify responses from Alipay.

properties.name: app.alipay.gateway-url
properties.description: Alipay API gateway URL (sandbox or production environment).

properties.name: app.alipay.notify-url
properties.description: URL that receives asynchronous payment notifications from Alipay.

properties.name: app.alipay.return-url
properties.description: URL for redirecting the user after completing payment on Alipay.

properties.name: app.alipay.sign-type
properties.description: Signature algorithm type for Alipay API requests (RSA2 recommended).

properties.name: app.alipay.charset
properties.description: Character encoding for Alipay API communication.

properties.name: app.alipay.format
properties.description: Data format for Alipay API requests and responses (json or xml).

properties.name: app.alipay.timeout-express
properties.description: Payment timeout period for Alipay transactions (e.g., '30m' for 30 minutes).
